Articles.Content:
I have my addon i exported and saved it from unity it loads fine in ksp but i am having issues skinning it to look good

also having a few CFG issues can someone point me in the correct direction
You have described none of your problems, we can't help you until you provide better information.

well i 1 want to skin/texture my parts so they have some subsistence and look nice but when i drag in the PNG file and add the command in the CFG the skin i made never shows

all other parts don't seam to attach correctly

in essence is there a skinning/texturing tutorial and another tutorial on writing the CFG file?

well i 1 want to skin/texture my parts so they have some subsistence and look nice but when i drag in the PNG file and add the command in the CFG the skin i made never shows

all other parts don't seam to attach correctly

in essence is there a skinning/texturing tutorial and another tutorial on writing the CFG file?

I don't know, but you're in the wrong section; this is the 'coding' area. You might get more help elsewhere.
I moved it to the modelling & texturing forum.

well i 1 want to skin/texture my parts so they have some subsistence and look nice but when i drag in the PNG file and add the command in the CFG the skin i made never shows

all other parts don't seam to attach correctly

in essence is there a skinning/texturing tutorial and another tutorial on writing the CFG file?

It sounds like you are trying to add the texture through the CFG file, which is not what you want to do. You have to apply it to the model in unity, and set the shader to KSP/diffuse. There should be some fairly new tutorials here.
